snippet: With Congo’s Army diverted to fighting a new rebel group in eastern Congo, new militia groups have arisen and older ones are reasserting themselves, the British charity Oxfam said Tuesday.
abstract: Newly formed militia groups have arisen in Congo, and others are reasserting themselves, killing hundreds of defenseless citizens; bloodshed occurs as Congo's Army remains diverted, fighting a new rebel group in the east.
lead_paragraph: With Congo’s Army diverted to fighting a new rebel group in eastern Congo, new militia groups have arisen and older ones are reasserting themselves, the British charity Oxfam said Tuesday.

headline.main: Congo: Militias Take Advantage of Focus on East, Group Says
headline.print_headline: Congo: Militias Take Advantage Of Focus on East, Group Says
